input.sentences: it is fall and the leaves are changing colors .
a small stream runs through the park .
there is a wooden bridge going from the parking lot to the park .
there is also a gravel trail going in to the woods .
there is a house on the outskirts that belongs to the person who owns the park .
output.sentences: Leaves had turned to their fall colors.
A gentle stream runs through the park.
A wooden bridge leads to the parking area of the park.
Through the woods there is a trail strewn with gravel.
A person lives in the park and the one who owns the house.
